title: A reproducible open-source framework for defining type 1 and type 2 diabetes research cohorts in routinely collected electronic health record data
details: R Hopkins, P Cardoso, LM Güdemann, AP McGovern… - medRxiv, 2025
abstract: Background Electronic health record data (EHR) data provide an increasingly important resource for studying people living with diabetes and their clinical outcomes, but robustly coding reproducible datasets is challenging. We aimed to …
